alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 7:59PM CDT until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Little Wabash River at Carmi .Water levels continue to rise along the Little Wabash River at Carmi. Minor flooding is occurring now, and the river will reach moderate flood stage Wednesday afternoon. The river is forecast to crest near 32.9 feet late Friday night. For the Little Wabash River...including Carmi...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wabash River at Carmi. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Flood waters flow up McHenry slough and areas near Route 1 and 14 in Carmi begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 27.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 32.9 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
